Items.Title: Oversight - Experience of New Yorkers enrolled in adult education and adult literacy programs.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish Diwali as an official holiday for New York City public school students.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish Diwali as an official holiday for  NYC public school students.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to incorporate Three Kings Day as an observed school holiday in the school calendar for the city school district of the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to incorporate Three Kings Day as an observed school holiday in the school calendar for the city school district of the city of NY.
